text: Joseph Jacques Marcel Bonin (September 8, 1931 â€“ January 19, 2025) was a Canadian professional ice hockey forward. He played in the National Hockey League with the Detroit Red Wings, Boston Bruins, and Montreal Canadiens between 1952 and 1962. He won the Stanley Cup four times in his career. Bonin died on January 19, 2025, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Marcel Bonin
